name: Travelling Trader: Death and Coin
description:
Travelling Trader is a Board/Card Game in which you try to make as much money as possible by trading goods between various towns. You can hire mercenaries to protect you from beasts and robbers as you brave the wilderness on the route to the next trade center.

Travelling Trader is still in development but absolutely playable-- And I'd love to hear your input to make this little project a great game!
